cab.content: \ , This Document is th* Property of^His Britannic Majesty^ Government,a ftp a.itary Secret.From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,lith January 1920.(Received 16th.)I 463. Malleson wires .12th January repeating Teheran, Constantinople, Baghdad,North Persian. Force, Kasvin, Krasnovodsk : " Austrian who left Asfcabad 8th January reports Bolshevik front is still atYagman. Further advance is difficult because line is commanded by volunteers'heavy guns and also lire from vessels in Gulf. Out-Hanking operations no longereasy as'volunteers' right is protected by Gulf and left by difficult hilly country whichthey have occupied. Bolshevik force is now very short of food and are suffering-much from the intense cold. Main Bolshevik force is now concentrated at KizilArvat for shelter and front is lightly held. Possibly Bolsheviks now intend to awaitcapture of Petrovsk and turn over of fleet."
